Description:
Perfect Entry Level Home or Investment on 996m2 approx
This modest home located on a fantastic block of 996m2 (approx) in a general residential zone 1 area will suit the first home buyer, investor or anyone looking for a foothold in the Crib Point property market.
The home itself is well presented and features:
- 3 bedrooms with new carpet and built in robes
- Bathroom plus separate toilet and laundry
- Gas heater in the lounge room
- Kitchen with gas upright cooker
Outside there is a single carport, rear covered pergola and garden shed.
Auction onsite Saturday 27th June at 1pm

Description:
Colonial Homestead
Set on a large 1000m2 block of land, this large 4 bedroom has been renovated from top to bottom. Re-located and clad with original clinker bricks which are hard to find these days, complemented by timber decks which surround the 4 sides of the home.
On entering the wide tiled entry you notice the high ceilings and the natural light throughout the house. With 3 living areas, 4 large bedrooms all with built in robes, 2 bathrooms and a large timber kitchen, which offers plenty of bench space s/s gas cook-top, wall oven d/w and walk in pantry.
It is a credit to the builder who has tastefully renovated this family home with neutral tones, new carpets, down lights, ducted heating and a HRV heating system.
With an open canvas there is plenty of space to build a shed, carport or garage. This is a solid family home that will not last on the market, make your move today.

Description:
Affordable half acre site - The Crib Point Bus Depot
Over half an acre (2441msq) with substantial improvements the Crib Point Bus Depot is now offered for sale.
On site offices, large covered shedding and three phase power. Mechanics will appreciate the well-designed service area, made for servicing big machinery.
On two separate titles the property is zoned industrial and offers a range of uses (STCA). Discuss the possibility of leasing the site back to the current Tennant, or make use of the storage space yourself.
For any further information or to arrange to meet an agent on site please contact Jason Dowler anytime.

Address: 3/339 Stony Point Rd Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Affordable, Neat and Tidy... In Top Location!
Perfectly positioned close to the Crib Point shops, schools and public transport, this 2 bedroom unit is ideal for those downsizing, buying their first home or the astute investor!
Comprising of a spacious lounge and dining area overlooking the hostess kitchen. There are two bedrooms with built in robes and nearby central bathroom, toilet and laundry.
Venture through to the courtyard and entertaining area, plenty of room for pets or the family get togethers. Other inclusions are gas heating and lock up garage.
Whether you're looking for a place to start, a convenient downsizer or a hassle free rental, this home will appeal. Properties in this price range are few and far between, so act fast and book an inspection today.

Description:
Large family home, quiet location, huge block!
Located in a highly sought after location and within walking distance to the Disney street shops, train station and parkland is this perfectly presented 4 large bedroom plus study (or kids retreat with built in games cupboard) home offering peace, privacy and a wonderful lifestyle.
The quiet street is set amongst matured treed allotments on larger blocks.
Boasting a large quarter acre (approx) block, a new quality kitchen including soft closing hinges, quality mosaic tiles and a dishwasher, 3 split system heaters/coolers, huge master suite with feature bath in the high quality bathroom, large fully fitted walk in robe and parents retreat, 2 quality bathrooms (a huge ensuite and quality family bathroom), large formal lounge and dining.
The home opens out onto a huge covered entertaining area complete with Spa, large feature bar and enough room to entertain all of your family and friends.
Tradespeople or home handy men will love the huge shed to the rear of the yard. Ideally suited to suit tradespeople, home handy men, hairdressers/beautician or personal trainers. Live the work from home dream.
Outside you will also find a double carport plus plenty of other parking.
Just walk in and enjoy this home and get on with living your life! For further information or to arrange your personal inspection please contact Jason Dowler anytime.

Address: 508 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Mornington Peninsula Lifestyle Property on Bittern Boarder- 1 Acre
Escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life on this rural outlook block of just over 1 acre. A meticulously maintained home with all the space and storage you could ask for, yet only a 2 minute drive to the Bittern Fields shopping centre and only 5 minutes to the centre of Hastings with all major shops and services.
The home features 3 bedrooms, main with built in robes and a full ensuite. The open plan lounge and meals area flows into the kitchen with an abundance of storage and a 900mm induction stove and oven. From the kitchen you look out over the large undercover outdoor entertainment area perfect for summer BBQ’s and complete with a sauna to help unwind any time you feel the need. The home has ducted gas heating, a coonara and a split system for cooling.
Outside are beautifully landscaped gardens complete with fruit and nut trees, a space to grow your own organic vegetables and an abundance of grass areas. A large 3.6m high drive through workshop with carports on either end provides more than enough parking for cars, boats, trailers and caravans. Further shedding at the rear of the block provides more secure storage. The property has an extra exit at the back, allowing large vehicles to drive in from Stony Point road and out onto Triton Avenue. Perfect for tradies who want to store their trucks at home, or to get your boat in and out without shuffling vehicles around.
With no rear neighbours, you can enjoy a peaceful bushlands outlook in a property only minutes to major amenities, 5 minutes to Jack's beach, 10 mins to Hastings and Stony Point boat ramps and 15 minutes to Somers and Balnarring beaches.
A lifestyle change with an acre of land (with the potential to purchase a further quarter acre adjoining), allowing you to enjoy your property where many these days are fence to fence with little or no yard. Just an hour to the Melbourne CBD with the new Peninsula Link, you can't go wrong here.
This property has to be seen to appreciate what is on offer. Pictures certianly don't do it justice.

Description:
Down to Earth Family Lifestyle (0.8 acre approx)
For a home with room for the family and a good piece of land to call your own look no further than this great property.
Situated on a generous 3319m2 (0.8 acre approx) block in a peaceful and sought after area of Crib Point this spacious home exudes country character and a down to earth ‘Aussie lifestyle’ feel.
The ranch style home welcomes you with a wide asphalt drive and full length front verandah. A spacious family living room is complemented by a built in bar and includes a gas coonara. The kitchen with stainless steel cooking and dishwasher is open to the dining area with split system and access to the rear deck. The master bedroom includes WIR and ensuite and 3 other bedrooms are serviced by a large main bathroom.
Outside is where this property really shines. A huge rear deck is perfect for summer entertaining and has gas plumbed in for the BBQ, there is also a gazebo, large workshop with concrete and power, two garden sheds and rear access from Governors Road.
A self contained unit is the ideal accommodation for teenagers or in-laws and includes a living area, bedroom with WIR, kitchen and bathroom.
This amazing family lifestyle property ticks all the boxes and still has room for your own improvements and special touches. Not to be missed!

Description:
What a Gem
Do you want state of the art living, with all the creature comforts and a maintenance free lifestyle? then this north facing home is a must see.
Only 3years old and in pristine condition inside and out this open plan home with 3 large bedrooms, main with a walk in robe and full en-suite, the other 2 have built in robes with television points throughout.
The entertainers kitchen features 2pak cupboard doors glass splash backs d/w, 900 s/s upright cooker, pantry and a large island bench all this plus granite tops. With high ceilings, sensor switched down lights d/h and s/s a/c you will feel comfortable all year round, not to mention the inbuilt gas log fire and solar boosted hot water.
Drive up the concreted driveway to a 2 car garage which is remote controlled and has the added benefit of internal entry into the house. There are timber decked areas around the home ideal for those lazy days at the barbecue, landscaped, fruit trees, a tidy front lawn and a picket fence. Don’t miss out on this neat property.

Description:
LAND AHOY
PERFECT FOR FIRST HOME BUYERS! What a fantastic sized block to build your dream home! Don't miss out on an opportunity to secure 409m2 (approx) of quality land. Located in the Mornington Peninsula's booming and yet still tranquil Crib Point, across from the Recreation Reserve and pool. With all services provided you have a rare opportunity to build in an established street and tucked away from the road. Only a 3 minute drive to HMAS Cerberus Naval Base and Stony Point ferry. Surrounded by some of the best beaches and wineries that the Mornington Peninsula has to offer such as Balnarring, Somers and Shoreham. This quiet and established spot is perfect for your family! Contact Exclusive Agent.

Description:
Sieze the Moment or Kick Yourself Later
BRAND NEW - ready to go. SIX SOLD, last available!
This single story townhouse boasts an excellent floor-plan, road frontage and set back off the street.
Well designed and built by well known fastidious builder Dema Constructions you can be assured you are getting excellent VALUE for money.
Conveniently located with access to transport (with-in a few short meters) medical centre, local shops and conveniences a leisurely stroll away.
Boasting 2 separate living zones, gas ducted heating, R/Cycle A/C and internal access from the huge single garage.
Other features include:
-S/S appliances including dishwasher

-soft closing draws, galley kitchen in modern neutral -tones low maintenance landscaped gardens with private courtyards
-water tank plumbed to toilet
-window locks
-clothes line, fly-wires to all windows, letterbox
-all connections
-2x T.V point
-sealed driveway and more

-neutral modern tones
-quality through-out
For more information call Andrea on 0417 400 660

Description:
Personality and Potential
As soon as you pull up the wide concrete drive and look up to this charming, painted western red cedar home with a decked front verandah and loads of character you will see yourself living here.
A formal entry with polished timber floors welcomes you, there are three bedrooms; master with ensuite and all with built in robes. The kitchen overlooks the informal dining room with access to the large covered deck, providing a great set up for entertainers. The lounge room is very spacious and with gas ducted heating and plenty of storage the essential creature comforts are covered.
Set on a low maintenance corner block (567m2 approx) there is rear access to a double carport with roller doors plus plenty of parking space in the front driveway. With so much personality and still plenty of potential to make it your own and add value this gem is sure to spark your imagination.

Affordable Housing At it's Best
This very affordable perfectly presented home boasts 3 generous sized bedrooms all with built in robes. The formal lounge is separate from the meals area which adjoins the recently new kitchen that has ample overhead cupboards, large walk in pantry and beautiful Tasman Oak and Spotted Gum bench tops. The meals area looks out to a lovely private rear yard with access from the sliding door to the outdoor area. Lovely polished hardwood floorboards throughout most of the home with a revamped bathroom also continuing with the Tasmanian oak and Spotted Gum bench tops to the new vanity. Outside boasts sealed driveway leading to the double carport with access to rear, various garden sheds, all this in a quiet court location close to the local schools, transport and sporting amenities. This affordable home is ideal for the first home buyer, or the astute purchaser looking for a great home to start your investment portfolio. Contact Exclusive Agent Wilma Green on 0407 833 996.

Description:
I'm Cute But Not Small & Boy Am I Tough To Beat!
Great Opportunity As A Home or Investment.
Only 4 yrs young is this premium 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom architecturally designed abode set in privacy & built to exacting standards. Boasting North facing living and outdoor entertaining capturing loads of natural light, this Queensland inspired home will appeal to those looking for a cut above the rest.
Opportunities are endless with options galore!
This home ticks so many boxes you couldn't go wrong. Live in or capitalize as an extra income earner used as a Bed and Breakfast or a holiday letter for the Peninsula visitors, avid golfers or keen fisherman.
Close to the ferry, Cerberus, Somers beach, trendy Balnarring Village, local markets and Hastings foreshore cafes, pool and restaurants.
Offering loads of impressive features including:
- Modern Design
- Highlight louvre windows
- Raked ceiling to living
- Merbau decks
- Stunning hard-wearing bamboo flooring
- 3 generous bedrooms, Main with en-suite and WIR
- Large central bathroom servicing the 2 adjacent bedrooms
- Generous laundry
- Great floor-plan
- Tropical Inspired design
- Gorgeous kitchen with freestanding 90 cm s/s oven, timber bench tops and Dbl sink
- Dishwasher
- Water-tank servicing toilets
- Established easy to maintain tropical garden
- Private from the street
- Access to a private deck from main bedroom.
- Impressive floor-plan boasting open-plan living
Overhead ceiling fans to living and bedrooms
and much more.
This property is not only a bargain it proves to be a far better buy than any 3 bedroom units available in Crib Point with far more extra space (set on 511m2), privacy, plenty of living inside and out, your own title, no body corp fees and even better, it is available for less than the purchase price of a small unit on shared land of half the land size.
Vendor moving interstate, so what are you waiting for, grab your opportunity or kick yourself later!
Call today to arrange your inspection

Description:
You Couldn't Pack in More Value
Hidden away at the end of a no-through street, this spacious double storey home has features in abundance. Two external entrances downstairs provide access to the main home and granny flat respectively, while an internal door allows you to separate the two areas if required.
Boasting 6 bedrooms altogether, the first storey of the main home provides a large lounge room with access to the backyard, bedroom with robes and powder room while the granny flat, perfect for an elderly parent or young teenage retreat, comes complete with two bedrooms and its own bathroom, kitchen and lounge area. The second storey provides kitchen with dishwasher and meals zone, spacious L-shaped lounge with sunroom and the final bedrooms including master with ensuite.
Outside provides a single carport, two sheds with concrete flooring, one including power and water, two large water tanks and rear access to the generous 1,257m2 approx. block which is the ideal blank canvas with the potential to sub-divide (STCA).

Description:
Beauty On The Block
Presented in a style worthy of a "Block" home, this 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, double lock up garage unit is picture perfect. Only 3 years young, from the minute you step in the front door you will immediately feel at home.
The master bedroom benefits from an abundance of natural light, with a walk in wardrobe and full ensuite. The second bedroom features a private courtyard perfect for reading outside in summer. The main bathroom has a separate bath and shower.
An open plan kitchen (with stainless steel appliances), lounge and dining overlooks the landscape back yard that is complete with an aviary, chicken coop and water features. A second lounge area allows for two living zones, no more fighting over friday night footy vs romantic comedy movie!
A drive through double garage provides plenty of parking space, storage, and easy access to the rear of the property.
This unit truly stands above the rest, inspection is a must to appreciate the work put into it.
